projectInfo.name: Smart Agri IoT Platform
projectInfo.description: A comprehensive IoT-enabled platform for smart agriculture management. It allows farmers to monitor farms, track crop health using satellite data (simulated/mocked), manage irrigation schedules, and receive critical alerts from IoT devices.
projectInfo.purpose: To empower farmers with data-driven insights for optimizing crop yield and resource usage (water, fertilizers) while providing real-time monitoring of field conditions.

externalServices.satellite: Mocked Service (Simulates NDVI, EVI, and Satellite Imagery)

keyFeatures.name: Farm Management
keyFeatures.description: Create and manage farms with geospatial boundaries. Visualized on an interactive map.

keyFeatures.name: Crop Health Monitoring
keyFeatures.description: Tracks crop performance using NDVI indices (mocked). Calculates health scores and generates automated recommendations (e.g., 'Water needed', 'Pest risk').

keyFeatures.name: Real-time Dashboard
keyFeatures.description: Aggregated view of total farms, active crops, critical alerts, and weather conditions.

keyFeatures.name: IoT Device Integration
keyFeatures.description: Supports registration and monitoring of IoT devices (sensors/actuators) via MQTT.

keyFeatures.name: Irrigation Scheduling
keyFeatures.description: Tools to schedule and track irrigation events based on soil moisture and weather data.

architecture.client: Single Page Application (SPA) served by Vite dev server or Nginx in production.
architecture.server: RESTful API with layered architecture (Routes -> Controllers/Services -> Models).
architecture.deployment: Dockerized setup (docker-compose.yml available) with separate services for Client, Server, Database, and MQTT Broker.

currentStatus.mapStatus: Functional. Uses OpenStreetMap tiles with custom markers.
currentStatus.apiStatus: Functional. Critical route ordering bugs resolved.
currentStatus.development: Active. Client and Server builds verified passing.
